profile.en:
A member of the Trinity Remedial Knights. She's wearing a Santa costume to celebrate Christmas.

Because she has a very active personality, Hanae needs a Santa costume that allows her freedom of movement. For a girl who finds everything exciting, Christmas is nothing less than a month-long festival. She carries bundles of presents everywhere she goes, and rings a bell to fill everyone with the spirit of the season.
profile.jp:
トリニティ総合学園所属、クリスマスを迎えてサンタ姿に着替えた救護騎士団の団員。

普段活発なハナエらしく、サンタ服も動きやすいものを選んでいる。なんでも楽しめるハナエにとって、クリスマスはまさにお祭りそのものなのだとか。プレゼントの包みを持って鐘を鳴らし、みんなに幸せを伝えるべくボランティアに参加している。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
三一综合学园所属，迎接圣诞节到来而换上了圣诞服的「救护骑士团」团员。

平时就活泼的花江，选择了很像她会选的便于行动的圣诞服。
对于无论什么都能乐在其中的花江来说，圣诞节就是庆典本身。
背着礼物袋，摇着铃铛，参加着为了给大家传递幸福的志愿活动。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
三一综合学园所属，为了迎接圣诞节而穿上圣诞老人服装的花绘。

平时就活泼的花绘，选择了方便活动的圣诞老人服装。对于一切都充满欢乐的花绘来说，圣诞节本身就个庆典。拿着礼物，敲着钟，为了把喜悦传递给大家而参加了慈善活动。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
三一综合学园所属，迎接圣诞节到来而换上了圣诞服的「救护骑士团」团员。

平时就活泼的花江，选择了很像她会选的便于行动的圣诞服。
对于无论什么都能乐在其中的花江来说，圣诞节就是庆典本身。
背着礼物袋，摇着铃铛，参加着为了给大家传递幸福的志愿活动。

desc.en: Serina and Hanae are out on charity activities with Sensei when they overhear that the Justice Task Force is preparing an end-of-year party. Knowing how the Justice Task Force is always tirelessly working to keep the school safe, Serina and Hanae are all too happy to learn that they're taking time to enjoy themselves.

Knowing how the Justice Task Force is always tirelessly working to keep the school safe, Serina and Hanae are all too happy to learn that they're taking time to enjoy themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 和老师一起准备慈善活动的{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}，偶然从{cn实现正义部}成员口中听见{cn实现正义部}在准备圣诞晚会的消息。{cn实现正义部}一直以来都为了校内的治安而付出辛劳，得知他们要休息的消息后，{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}觉得很开心。

desc.en: It's Christmas day. The Justice Task Force is in a standoff with some thugs in a back alley and confiscates some strange item after apprehending them. After the Justice Task Force leaves the scene, the thugs are bemoaning their miserable predicament when they spot Sensei and the Remedial Knights out on charity activities and hatch a devious plan.

After the Justice Task Force leaves the scene, the thugs are bemoaning their miserable predicament when they spot Sensei and the Remedial Knights out on charity activities and hatch a devious plan.
desc.zh_cn: 圣诞节当天。{cn实现正义部}正在后巷的某处和混混们对峙中。很快就处理好情况，回收来历不明的物品。{cn实现正义部}悠哉离开后，混混们感叹自己输得一蹋糊涂的惨状，同时也发现了去进行慈善活动的老师和{cn救护骑士团}，并悄悄展开了可疑的计划。

desc.en: Upon hearing the thugs' terrible tale, Serina and Hanae start to grapple with the true meaning of aid and salvation. After hearing the details of the situation, Mine begins to question her own shortcomings. She quickly heads to the Justice Task Force's end-of-year party alone to make a formal complaint.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the thugs' terrible tale, Serina and Hanae start to grapple with the true meaning of aid and salvation. desc.zh_cn: 听见混混们令人惋惜的事情后，{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}开始苦思何谓真正的救护。听说目前发生的一切情况后，{cf美祢}深切体会到自己的不足之处。过了一会儿，为了正式向{cn实现正义部}抗议，她独自离开了。

desc.zh_cn: {cn救护骑士团}与{cn实现正义部}终于明白自己是被混混的诡计所蒙骗，才会引起这场骚动的。造成骚动的主因就是「地狱火炸鸡」。为了对付露出真面目的混混，{cn救护骑士团}与{cn实现正义部}齐心协力压制混混。

desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

医療品集め

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
